description: This file defines a React functional component 'GameBoard' that renders a Tic Tac Toe game grid using the 'react-native' framework. It displays the game board based on the 'board' prop, handles cell interactions, and optionally highlights winning lines.

methods.name: GameBoard
methods.description: React functional component rendering the game grid based on props.

methods.name: styles
methods.description: Defines styles for the grid layout using StyleSheet.create.
